feed.title: Node Security
feed.subtitle: Security and programming blog containing guides and examples of how to do various penetration testing and programming related tasks.

entry.title: Modifying Source Code of JNLP Resources

link.title: Modifying Source Code of JNLP Resources

entry.summary: This guide can be used when the goal is to modify the source code of the resource JARs used by a Java application that is launched via a JNLP file. The below guide assumes the application uses HTTP to communicate with the server. A SOCKS proxy may also need to be configured in the proxy settings if it uses raw TCP with a proprietary protocol. Configure Java Proxy Security ...

entry.title: External Information Gathering
entry.summary: Collection of tools, techniques, and payloads for external information gathering when performing an external security assessment. entry.title: General Encoder & Decoder
entry.summary: General encoder (and decoder) that can be used for various common encoding methods. Currently included decoding functions: Base64 HEX URL HTML ROT-N (1-25) Atbash String Reversal Multi Tap Phone Keyboard All processing is done client-side via JavaScript. Input Results
